Detailed Description

Our model object.

Stores a list of modelItems, as well as a logicFunction.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

model::model (    ) 
 

Primative Constructor.

Constructs and empty model.

model::model (  const model &    p ) 
 

Copy Constructor.

Copies the model.

model::~model (    )  [virtual]
 

Destructor.

Destroys all the elements in the list, however, it does not recursively delete models.

Member Function Documentation

void model::addItem (  modelItem *    i ) 
 

Adds a modelItem.

Adds the modelItem to the list

Parameters:
i  The model item to add

void model::addLogic (  void(*    logicFunction)(model &, std::map< string, double > &, std::list< modelItem * > &) ) 
 

Add a logic function.

Adds a logic function to the model. Once this is set, the function is called prior to the model being rendered. The logic function must take three arguments, the model calling it, a map which is its memory to modify as it needs, and a list of modelItems that it can add models to.

int model::getName (    )  [virtual]
 

Returns the type of the subclass.

This function is used to return the type of the subclass.

Returns:
1 -> Model 2 -> Transform 3 -> Depricated 4 -> Light

Implements modelItem.

void model::render (  matrix &    m,
vector< point3D * > &    pointList,
list< polygonRef3D > &    polygonList,
vector< modelLight > &    lightList
) 
 

Renders the model.

This steps through the list of modelItems, applying the transforms to the VTM, and recursively calling render on the models, modelPrimatives, lights.

Parameters:
m  The incoming GTM
pointList  The global list of points that will contain all points in the scene once everything has rendered.
polygonList  The global list of polygons that will contain all polygons in the scene once everything has rendered.
lightList  The global list of lights that will contain all lights in the scene once everything has rendered.

void model::render (  matrix &    m,
vector< point3D * > &    pointList,
list< polygonRef3D > &    polygonList,
std::map< string, double > &    memory,
vector< modelLight > &    lightList
) 
 

Renders the model.

This steps through the list of modelItems, applying the transforms to the VTM, and recursively calling render on the models, modelPrimatives, lights.

Parameters:
m  The incoming GTM
pointList  The global list of points that will contain all points in the scene once everything has rendered.
polygonList  The global list of polygons that will contain all polygons in the scene once everything has rendered.
memory  The incoming memory from the parent model. For use by the logicFunction.
lightList  The global list of lights that will contain all lights in the scene once everything has rendered.

Member Data Documentation

std::vector< std::map<string, double> > model::childMemory
 

The memory passed down to all the child models.

This data is passed down by reference to each of the models that are contained within the model, allow the children to pass information back up to the parent by way of modifying this memory.
